title: Aolesy Men's 2 in 1 Running Shorts - 5" Workout Gym Athletic Shorts Quick Dry Lightweight Training Shorts with Pockets
description: Upgraded Fabrics: Our mens 2 in 1 workout shorts are made of quick-drying fabric, which is lightweight and breathable, so you won't feel stuffy when exercising. The mens shorts has good resistance to pilling and deformation.

2 in 1 Design: The outer layer and compression liner of our mens workout shorts are stretchy, the compression liner is designed to provide support to the thigh muscles, without friction or other bad feelings. You can reveal the lining or you can hide it. The towel ring at the back is more convenient for movement.

Function Pockets: Our running shorts for men include a back zippered pocket, two deep enough side pockets, a cell phone pocket in the compression inner lining. All pockets securely stash cash, keys, cards and phone. Our mens running shorts designed to keep your hands free during activities.

Waist Drawstring: The personalized drawstring adds a casual and energetic feel to the gym shorts for men, the elastic waistband is easy to adjusted and give your body with solid support that won't come off easily during exercise.

Multiple Occasions: With high comfort, classic and fashionable style. Our men’s athletic shorts are suitable for many occasions, such as home wear, running, gym, workout, fitness, jogging, basketball, tennis, football, training, athletic, yoga, boxing, outdoor activities, etc.
